views.markdown:
• Adds support for maps.apple.com links. • Adds support for some new Maps links in iOS 10, including the Messages location sharing "Directions To Here" button. • Improves support for some Apple Maps links. 1.5.5:
• Fixes various issues causing some links to not be opened.

1.5.6:
• Fixes an issue causing some apps to freeze.
• Fixes an issue causing some locations to fail to open on iOS 9.
• Due to freezing/crashing issues on iOS 9, some logic has been disabled. A proper fix will be coming as soon as possible. More details on reddit.

• Fixes an issue that causes a crash when injecting a tweak into a 32-bit app (such as Cydia) on iPhone 6s. Fixes a crash when opening Google Maps links. Fixes an issue causing some apps to freeze and Google Maps links to not open on iOS 6.

• Adds support for coordinate-based locations.
• Adds support for shortened links (for example, https://goo.gl/maps/XYltH).
• Fixes an issue causing some apps, including Messages, to still open the iOS Maps app.

Don't forget to have the latest Google Maps app version installed.
- Improves detection of Apple Maps links.
- Adds support for opening Google Maps from Siri.
- Fixes automatically detected address links opening to the current location.
- Adds improvements to decrease the chance of a future iOS update breaking MapsOpener.
- Support for iOS 7 and Opener’s new API.
- Improves detection of Google Maps links.
- Adds support for a new Maps link format.
- Fixed links from Calendar opening Google Maps to the current location
- Added support for getting directions from Siri
- Fixes an issue causing Maps to not open to the right location on some devices - MapsOpener should now support all Maps links - Fixes a bug that prevents locations opened via contacts or calendar events from going to the specified location
- Internally, MapsOpener now uses the libopener library
